Module kivakit.configuration
Package com.telenav.kivakit.configuration.lookup

Class Registry

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.configuration.lookup.Registry
All Implemented Interfaces:
RegistryTrait
public class Registry extends Object implements RegistryTrait

The Registry class allows code to register and locate objects by class and instance (if there is more than one instance). The methods RegistryTrait.register(Object) and RegistryTrait.register(Object, Enum) are used to install an object in the lookup and RegistryTrait.lookup(Class), RegistryTrait.lookup(Class, Enum), RegistryTrait.require(Class) and RegistryTrait.require(Class, Enum) are used to find an object that has been registered.

RegistryTrait

The RegistryTrait interface provides a set of default convenience methods that can be added to any class. The Component interface in kivakit-component extends RegistryTrait to provide easy access to registry methods to all components.

Example

In this example, the initialize() method and the doit() method may be in different classes or packages. The doit() method can find the WEB instance of the Server class using RegistryTrait.lookup(Class, Enum) 

 enum Servers { WEB, TRAFFIC, MAP }

 void initialize()
 {
     Registry.of(this).register(new Server(), WEB);
 }

     [...]

 void doit()
 {
     var server = Registry.of(this).lookup(Server.class, WEB);

         [...]
 }

jonathanl (shibo)
